original_text: “When a calf, a lamb or a goat is born, it is to remain with its mother for seven days. From the eighth day on, it will be acceptable as a food offering presented to the Lord.
korean_text: 수소나 양이나 염소가 나거든 이레 동안 그것의 어미와 같이 있게 하라 여덟째 날 이후로는 여호와께 화제로 예물을 드리면 기쁘게 받으심이 되리라

sentences.original_text: When a calf, a lamb or a goat is born
sentences.korean_translation: 송아지나 어린 양이나 염소가 태어날 때

sentences.original_text: it is to remain with its mother for seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 이틀 동안 그 어미와 함께 있어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: it will be acceptable as a food offering
